Resiliency - Human Security - Emergency Preparedness

About

Secondary Cities is the flagship, field-based initiative of the Office of the Geographer to map for Resiliency, Human Security, and Emergency Preparedness.

We build partnerships to create geospatial capacity, enhance understanding through data and mapping, and enable science-based decision making.

Cities

Rabat, Morocco

Mekelle, Ethiopia

Pokhara, Nepal

Medellin, Colombia

Cusco, Peru

Kharkiv, Ukraine

Partners

Our partners build relationships in the field working with embassy and local government officials, universities, and non-governmental organizations.

American Association of Geographers
Colorado State University
EcoCity Builders
Kathmandu Living Labs

Data

Human Geography data collected during each
Secondary City project are freely available via our Geonode

Data Layers  

Map Layers
